title: Companion
description: Two powerful men: one property, one a great lord, and both haunted by specters of the past, are forced together by a society crumbling at the edges. To survive, they must find trust, friendship, and perhaps something more.Status: CompleteWord count: approx. 102,066 As at August 2012 the URL no longer leads to these stories, which seem to be no longer available.
author: Fading Madness Productions
